snippet: Mondelez International, the maker of Cadbury chocolate and Chips Ahoy cookies, is carving out its coffee business to combine it in a joint venture with a Dutch company to form a global coffee seller with more than $7 billion in annual revenue.
abstract: Mondelez International, maker of Cadbury chocolate and Chips Ahoy cookies, will embark on joint venture with Dutch company D E Master Blenders 1753 to form global coffee seller with more than $7 billion in annual revenue; new company will be called Jacobs Douwe Egberts.
lead_paragraph: Mondelez International, the maker of Cadbury chocolate and Chips Ahoy cookies, is carving out its coffee business to combine it in a joint venture with a Dutch company to form a global coffee seller with more than $7 billion in annual revenue.

headline.main: Mondelez and Dutch Firm Aim to Create a Coffee Powerhouse
headline.print_headline: Mondelez and Dutch Firm Aim to Create a Coffee Powerhouse
